input.name: name
input.description:
The new project's name.
If unspecified, defaults to "Unnamed project".

input.name: data
input.description: The text containing data in a .csv format.

input.name: tree
input.description:
The text containing data in a .nwk format to build a phylogenetic tree.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: network
input.description:
The text containing data in a .fot format to build a network.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: api
input.description:
The url of the microreact api.
If unspecified, defaults to `https://microreact.org/api`.

input.name: idField
input.description:
The column, from the data input, that will be used as the id of each row.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: timelineField
input.description:
The column, from the data input, that contains the timeline data.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: timelineFormat
input.description:
How to format the timeline field input.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: mapLatitude
input.description:
The column, from the data input, that contains the latitude data.
If unspecified, defaults to null.

input.name: mapLongitude
input.description:
The column, from the data input, that contains the longitude data.
If unspecified, defaults to null.
